language.name: English
view.description: Switch views without leaving offline mode.
help.title: Help center
help.subtitle: Quick answers for staying productive offline.
help.quickStart.title: Quick start
help.quickStart.step1: Create a project and add production details.
help.quickStart.step2: Add categories for departments, then list gear items inside each one.
help.quickStart.step3: Autosave runs after every change; watch the status panel for confirmation.
help.quickStart.step4: Use templates to reuse proven kits without overwriting current lists.
help.safety.title: Offline data safety
help.safety.step1: All data stays on this device in IndexedDB plus redundant device backups.
help.safety.step2: Use Save now before closing the app for an extra checkpoint.
help.safety.step3: Download a backup file and store it offline for disaster recovery.
help.safety.step4: Restore from device backup if local storage is ever compromised.
help.sharing.title: Sharing & exports
help.sharing.step1: Share via clipboard copies a JSON backup for offline handoff.
help.sharing.step2: Import backups merges data without deleting existing projects.
help.sharing.step3: PDF export opens a print-ready layout for crew and rentals.
help.sharing.step4: Project notes are included in exports and backups.
help.return.title: Back to editing
help.return.body: Switch to the Editor view to update gear lists, templates, and backups.
docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Detailed workflows for data safety, backups, and offline sharing.
docs.dataSafety.title: Data safety architecture
docs.dataSafety.body1: Every change is autosaved to IndexedDB and mirrored to device backups.
docs.dataSafety.body2: Backups keep the latest and previous versions to reduce risk of data loss.
docs.saving.title: Saving workflow
docs.saving.body1: Use Save now to trigger an immediate checkpoint before traveling or closing the app.
docs.saving.body2: Autosave batches edits for performance while preserving every change locally.
docs.backup.title: Backup, import, restore
docs.backup.body1: Download backup creates a JSON file you can store offline.
docs.backup.body2: Import backup merges incoming data and preserves current projects and templates.
docs.backup.body3: Restore from device backup rehydrates the latest reliable copy after storage issues.
docs.sharing.title: Offline sharing
docs.sharing.body1: Share via clipboard copies a backup payload for offline transfer.
docs.sharing.body2: Paste it into a local file or note and move it between devices safely.
docs.pdf.title: PDF export
docs.pdf.body1: PDF export prints the active project with categories, quantities, statuses, and notes.
docs.templates.title: Templates & suggestions
docs.templates.body1: Templates store reusable categories and items without overwriting existing lists.
docs.templates.body2: Typeahead remembers item names, units, and details to speed up entry.
docs.translations.title: Translations
docs.translations.body1: Translation files live in src/i18n and can be extended per locale.
docs.translations.body2: Add new UI copy to the locale JSON files to keep help and workflows aligned.
docs.offline.title: Recommended offline workflow
docs.offline.body1: Save now, download a backup, and optionally share via clipboard before travel.
docs.offline.body2: Restore or import backups when switching devices or recovering from storage issues.
